alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 8:19PM PDT until April 21 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Stevens Pass, Holden Village, and Stehekin. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow rates of up to an inch per hour is expected through midnight Thursday. Light snow continuing through early Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
